SEARCH
Package control

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
control.UserManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserManager
public class UserManager extends Object implements IUserManager
The UserManager class handles user authentication, session management, and user data persistence.

This singleton class implements the IUserManager interface and provides:

  • User authentication (login/logout)
  • User session tracking
  • Password management
  • User data loading and persistence

The class maintains a map of all users in the system and provides methods to authenticate and manage them. It also tracks the currently logged-in user to control session access.

    • login

      public boolean login(String nric, String password)
      Authenticates a user with the provided NRIC and password.

      If authentication is successful, the user is set as the current user and the login is logged in the system log.

      Specified by:
      login in interface IUserManager
      Parameters:
      nric - The user's NRIC (unique identifier)
      password - The user's password
      Returns:
      true if authentication is successful, false otherwise

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user.

      Logs the logout event before clearing the current user.

      Specified by:
      logout in interface IUserManager

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String oldPassword, String newPassword)
      Changes the current user's password.

      The password change is only successful if:

      • The user is currently logged in
      • The old password is correctly verified
      • The new password is different from the old password
      • The new password meets the complexity requirements (minimum 6 characters with at least 1 letter and 1 number)
      Specified by:
      changePassword in interface IUserManager
      Parameters:
      oldPassword - The user's current password
      newPassword - The new password to set
      Returns:
      true if the password was successfully changed, false otherwise

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Gets the currently logged-in user.
      Specified by:
      getCurrentUser in interface IUserManager
      Returns:
      The current user, or null if no user is logged in

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String nric)
      Gets a user by their NRIC number.
      Specified by:
      getUser in interface IUserManager
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC to look up
      Returns:
      The User with the specified NRIC, or null if not found

    • saveUsers

      public void saveUsers()
      Saves all user data to the users.txt file.

      Writes each user's data as a comma-separated line in the format: NRIC,password,age,maritalStatus,userType,name

      Specified by:
      saveUsers in interface IUserManager
